audioText: La fin du film était très émouvante, beaucoup de spectateurs pleuraient dans la salle.
question: What does the speaker say about the end of the movie?
options: It was very moving and many viewers were crying in the theater
It was confusing and people didn't understand it
It was too loud and disturbed the audience
It was boring and people left early
explanation: The speaker says 'La fin du film était très émouvante' - The end of the movie was very moving. Many spectators were crying in the theater.
